title: Account safety and protecting
body: What if i forgot my email that i verified when i just signed up for league? Is there someway to change my email address without verifying the one i already forgot and became unable to use?

replies.body: Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)! As long as you can verify you were the one who created this account, they should be able to get that email updated.
